item.title: By: Thoughts from the Void
item.dc:creator: Thoughts from the Void
item.description:
<strong>Gaming Revival...</strong>
Yes, I did actually end up seeing South Park's Warcraft episode. I'm not sure why some folks are calling it "an advertisement" for Warcraft, given its hilarious depiction of die-hard players as pock-marked tubs of lard with no lives; anyway, I thou...
item.content:encoded:
Gaming Revival…

Yes, I did actually end up seeing South Park’s Warcraft episode. I’m not sure why some folks are calling it “an advertisement” for Warcraft, given its hilarious depiction of die-hard players as pock-marked tubs of lard with no lives; anyway, I thou…
